biocontainers.name: control-freec
biocontainers.summary: A tool for control-free copy number alteration (cna) and allelic imbalances (loh) detection using deep-sequencing data, particularly useful for cancer studies.

biotools.summary: Control-FREEC is a tool for detection of copy-number changes and allelic imbalances (including LOH) using deep-sequencing data

bioschemas.name: Control-FREEC
bioschemas.summary: Control-FREEC is a tool for detection of copy-number changes and allelic imbalances (including LOH) using deep-sequencing data
